forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. West southwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of downtown San Francisco, today unfolds under a mostly sunny sky, with the gentle warmth beckoning as a soft west-southwest wind whispers through the streets. A high nearing 69 degrees promises a pleasant afternoon, though the temperature will descend to about 67, curtailing the warmth just as the sun begins its slow descent. The breezes, playful yet composed, may pick up a bit, bringing with them the familiar dance of the Golden Gate's marine layer — a reminder that the coastal fog is never too far away. 

As dusk approaches and the clouds gather to cloak the horizons, an evening low of 60 degrees invites an embrace of comfort, suggesting layers are wise. A light jacket or cardigan will serve well, especially if one ventures along the waterfront, where the hint of chill from the ocean can catch the unsuspecting. The pursuit of simple pleasures today is rewarded; perhaps a leisurely stroll under the afternoon sun’s caress before indulging in the evening's social gatherings, or even a quiet moment spent at a favorite café, savoring a warm drink as the world winds down. Embrace the serenity of the sights and sounds, as this day unfolds in its typically graceful San Franciscan manner.
